|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = |rad2ac = 1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ZyXEL LTE5398-M904 is a dual band 802.11ac indoor LTE/3G CPE with an FXS port. ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/zyxel/zyxel_lte5398-m904 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/zyxel/lte5398-m904 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/openwrt-support-for-zyxel-lte5398-m904/140157 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt7621 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = snapshot |unsupportedfuncntions = FXS/Voice |comment = LTE/3G: Quectel EG18-EA LTE-A Cat. 18 }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 57600,8N1 Unpopulated header J5: 
 [o] GND
 [ ] key - no pin
 [o] RX
 [o] TX
 [o] 3.3V Vcc
